# suspending

**Type Property**

Configures the render pass as *suspending*.

## Declaration

```swift
static var suspending: MTL4RenderEncoderOptions { get }
```

## Discussion

Pass this option to [doc://com.apple.metal/documentation/Metal/MTL4CommandBuffer/makeRenderCommandEncoder(descriptor:options:)] to specify that Metal can stitch the work a render command encoder encodes with a subsequent “resuming” render command encoder.
